about.title: About CountyWide Pressure Washing
about.subtitle: Your Trusted Cleaning Experts
about.text1: CountyWide Pressure Washing provides professional cleaning services for residential and commercial properties. We use state-of-the-art equipment and eco-friendly solutions to restore your surfaces to like-new condition.
about.text2: Our experienced team is committed to delivering exceptional results with every job. From driveways and sidewalks to building exteriors and decks, we have the expertise to handle all your pressure washing needs safely and effectively.

items.title: Residential Cleaning
items.description:
House washing, driveway cleaning, and deck restoration

Roof cleaning and gutter brightening

items.title: Soft Washing!
items.description:
• Gentle cleaning for delicate surfaces like siding and roofs. 
  • Eco-friendly solutions that kill mold, mildew, and algae 
  • Long-lasting results without high pressure damage

items.description:
Concrete cleaning and sealing for lasting protection

Wood deck cleaning, staining, and sealing

Paver restoration and joint sand replacement
